sentences.english: Wolves and dogs can interbreed and produce offspring.
sentences.chinese: 狼和狗能夠異種交配而且繁育後代。

sentences.english: Objective Explore the safety of the reconstituted bone xenograft(RBX) in the clinical application.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討重組合異種骨在臨牀應用中的安全性。

sentences.english: Methods Relevant literatures about current advance of xenotransplantation published recently domestic and abroad were collected and reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 方法分析近年來異種器官移植進展的文獻報道。

sentences.english: The author summarizes the debate over the cross-species infection and appropriate research guideline within differ…
sentences.chinese: 因此，對異種移植研究一直存在許多爭論。

sentences.english: Therefore, human tumor xenografts have been widely used in the research of anticancer drugs.
sentences.chinese: 因此，人體腫瘤異種移植在藥物研究中得到廣泛應用。

sentences.english: It is not as congeneric as jasmine heterogeneous plant.
sentences.chinese: 是與茉莉不同屬的異種植物。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the current advance of xenotransplantation.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結異種器官移植的新進展。

sentences.english: However, the infected mice challenged with the heterologous strain of plasmodia were died completely.
sentences.chinese: 而異種瘧原蟲攻擊時小鼠全部感染並死亡。

sentences.english: It may be composed of allelochemics such as alkaloids or terpenes.
sentences.chinese: 它可以由異種化合物例如生物堿或萜稀組成。

sentences.english: The survival time of the xenografts was observed.
sentences.chinese: 觀察異種移植物的生存時間。

sentences.english: Conclusion RBX has no obvious immune rejection and could be used safely in the clinic.
sentences.chinese: 結論重組合異種骨無明顯免疫原性，臨牀應用安全。

sentences.english: The author summarizes the debate over the cross-species infection and appropriate research guideline within different sc…
sentences.chinese: 因此，對異種移植研究一直存在許多爭論。

sentences.english: Pigs are considered as ideal organ donor for human future xenotransplantation.
sentences.chinese: 豬是人異種器官移植理想的器官來源。

sentences.english: However, basic allelochemical activity seems to lie with the aglycone.
sentences.chinese: 可是，基本的異種化合物活性看來是由配基所決定的。

sentences.english: The main risk in xenotransplantation is the transmission of diseases.
sentences.chinese: 異種移植存在的主要危險是傳播疾病。

sentences.english: This nest is called the mixed nests is indeed heterogeneous commensalism.
sentences.chinese: 這種蟻巢叫做混合性蟻巢，實爲異種共棲。

definition: courtesy name of Zhao Yun 趙雲|赵云[Zhao4 Yun2], general of Shu in Romance of the Three Kingdoms
literary (rather than colloquial) pronunciation of a Chinese character
dualism, belief that the universe is made of two different substance (e.g. mind and matter or good and evil)
